data.title: Jordan Lake State Recreation Area: Home
data.text:
Operating Season and Park Hours

Tab/Accordion Items

Crosswinds Campground

Area Opens On Closes On Camping areas A to C Jan 1, 2024 Sep 9, 2024

Ebenezer Church Access

Area/Facility Opens On Closes On Day-use area open year-round Picnic shelter #1 open year-round Picnic shelter #2 and #8 Mar 4, 2024 Oct 28, 2024

New Hope Overlook Access

Area Opens On Closes On Trail and boat ramp Open year-round Camping areas A and B* Mar 4, 2024 Dec 2, 2024

*All walk-up sites, reserved onsite at the campground and available on a first-come, first-served basis only

Parkers Creek Access

Area/Facility/Loop Opens On Closes On Day-use area Mar 4, 2024 Nov 12, 2024 Picnic shelters #3 to #6 Mar 4, 2024 Nov 12, 2024 Group camp Mar 4, 2024 Dec 2, 2024 Camping loop 1 Apr 1, 2024 Oct 28, 2024 Camping loop 2 Mar 25, 2024 Oct 28, 2024 Camping loop 3* Mar 18, 2024 Oct 28, 2024 Camping loop 4 north* Mar 11, 2024 Oct 28, 2024 Camping loop 4 south* Mar 4, 2024 Oct 28, 2024

*All walk-up sites, reserved onsite at the campground and available on a first-come, first-served basis only

Poplar Point Access

Loop Opens On Closes On Camping loop B Apr 22, 2024 Sep 30, 2024 Camping loop C Apr 8, 2024 Dec 31, 2024 Camping loop E* Mar 25, 2024 Dec 31, 2024 Camping loop F Apr 15, 2024 Dec 31, 2024 Camping loop G Apr 29, 2024 Sep 30, 2024 Camping loop H May 6, 2024 Sep 9, 2024 Camping loop J May 13, 2024 Sep 9, 2024

*All walk-up sites, reserved onsite at the campground and available on a first-come, first-served basis only

Seaforth Access

Area/Facility Opens On Closes On Day-use area open year-round Picnic shelter #9 open year-round

Vista Point Access

Area/Facility Opens On Closes On Group camp Mar 4, 2024 Dec 2, 2024 RV group camp Mar 4, 2024 Dec 2, 2024 Boat ramp Mar 4, 2024 Dec 2, 2024 Picnic shelters #7 and #10 Mar 4, 2024 Dec 2, 2024

White Oak Area

Area Opens On Closes On Day-use area^ Apr 6, 2024 Sep 29, 2024 Rental open year-round

^Note: White Oak is open for day-use during these dates only on weekends and holidays, and when the area is not reserved.

Crosswinds Campground

Area Opens On Closes On Camping areas A to C April 7, 2025 Dec. 31, 2025

Ebenezer Church Access

Area/Facility Opens On Closes On Day-use area open year-round Picnic shelter #1 open year-round Picnic shelter #2 and #8 March 10, 2025 Oct. 27, 2025

New Hope Overlook Access

Area Opens On Closes On Trail and boat ramp Open year-round Camping areas A and B* March 3, 2025 Dec. 1, 2025

*All walk-up sites, reserved onsite at the campground and available on a first-come, first-served basis only

Parkers Creek Access

Area/Facility/Loop Opens On Closes On Day-use area March 10, 2025 Nov. 17, 2025 Picnic shelters #3 to #6 March 10, 2025 Nov. 17, 2025 Group camp March 3, 2025 Dec. 1, 2025 Camping loop 1 March 24, 2025 Nov. 17, 2025 Camping loop 2 March 17, 2025 Nov. 17, 2025 Camping loop 3* May 19, 2025 Nov. 17, 2025 Camping loop 4 north* March 10, 2025 Nov. 17, 2025 Camping loop 4 south* March 3, 2025 Nov. 17, 2025

*All walk-up sites, reserved onsite at the campground and available on a first-come, first-served basis only

Poplar Point Access

Loop Opens On Closes On Camping loop B March 24, 2025 Sept. 2, 2025 Camping loop C Jan. 1, 2025 Sept. 29, 2025 Camping loop E* Jan. 1, 2025 Sept. 29, 2025 Camping loop F Jan. 1, 2025 Sept. 29, 2025 Camping loop G May 5, 2025 Sept. 2, 2025 Camping loop H May 12, 2025 Sept. 2, 2025 Camping loop J May 19, 2025 Sept. 2, 2025

*All walk-up sites, reserved onsite at the campground and available on a first-come, first-served basis only

Seaforth Access

Area/Facility Opens On Closes On Day-use area open year-round Picnic shelter #9 open year-round

Vista Point Access

Area/Facility Opens On Closes On Group camp March 3, 2025 Dec. 1, 2025 RV group camp March 3, 2025 Dec. 1, 2025 Boat ramp March 10, 2025 Nov. 17, 2025 Picnic shelters #7 and #10 March 10, 2025 Nov. 17, 2025

Area Opens On Closes On Day-use area^ April 5, 2025 Sept. 28, 2025 Rental open year-round

^Note: White Oak is open for day-use during these dates only on weekends and holidays, and when the area is not reserved.

Month

Hours

January 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. February 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. March 8 a.m. to 8 p.m. April 8 a.m. to 8 p.m. May 8 a.m. to 9 p.m. June 8 a.m. to 9 p.m. July 8 a.m. to 9 p.m. August 8 a.m. to 9 p.m. September 8 a.m. to 8 p.m. October 8 a.m. to 8 p.m. November 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. December 8 a.m. to 6 p.m.

Not all day-use areas are open year-round. Please check the park's operating season schedule for dates.

Jordan Lake's day-use area gates and campground gates open and lock promptly at the posted times. No entry or exit is permitted when the gates are closed, except for law enforcement or medical emergencies.

Crosswinds and Poplar Point campground gates have 24-hour access.

Parkers Creek, Vista Point, and New Hope Overlook campground gates lock at the posted times below:

Month Hours January 8 a.m. to 8 p.m. February 8 a.m. to 8 p.m. March 8 a.m. to 9 p.m. April 8 a.m. to 9 p.m. May 8 a.m. to 10 p.m. June 8 a.m. to 10 p.m. July 8 a.m. to 10 p.m. August 8 a.m. to 10 p.m. September 8 a.m. to 10 p.m. October 8 a.m. to 9 p.m. November 8 a.m. to 8 p.m. December 8 a.m. to 8 p.m.

Not all camping areas are open year-round. Please check the park's operating season schedule for dates.

No entry or exit is permitted when the gates are closed, except for law enforcement or medical emergencies.

From November to February, open Monday to Friday only, from 8 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.

From March to October, open daily, from 8 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.
